Synopsis: Checks the availability of a specified module and imports it if available.
Description: This function checks if a specified module is available. If the module is not loaded, it attempts to import it. Returns $true if the module is successfully loaded, otherwise $false.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-ModulesAvailability -Name "AzureRM"
Checks if the "AzureRM" module is available and imports it if not already loaded.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-ModulesAvailability -Name "ActiveDirectory"
Checks the availability of the "ActiveDirectory" module and imports it if necessary.
